content.title: Panglao、El Nidoリハビリ -  SunStar PhilippinesでEOを発行する必要はありません
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte will not issue an executive order on the rehabilitation of tourist spots Panglao Island in Bohol and El Nido in Palawan, Malacañang said on Wednesday, December 5. This was agreed upon during a Cabinet meeting presided over by Duterte at the Malacañan Palace on Tuesday, December 4, Presidential Spokesperson Salvador Panelo said. "On the rehabilitation of Panglao Island in Bohol and El Nido in Palawan, the Cabinet agreed that there is no need to issue an Executive Order," the Palace official said in a statement. On November 9, the Department of Tourism announced the ...

content.title: プランナーで休憩を計画する -  SunStar Philippines
content.source_nm: サンスターフィリピン
content.desc: - TRAVELING is made more available and affordable especially for the youth with Mac Planner Travel and Tours which just opened their branch at Abreeza Ayala Malls, Wednesday, November 28. “In this generation, travel is a trend. Even the youth wants to travel. We want them to experience affordable traveling because we offer affordable promos, packages, even hotel accommodations,” said Marjorie Billie Macale, one of the owners of the family-owned business.
